channel.title: AARScape is BACK! [Old-School][Webclient]
channel.description:
AARscape has a friendly community forums where everyone is willing to help if needed. It also has a well rounded economy, and every skill works! We have custom mini games and custom quest with great rewards! The server is updated daily with a dedicated staff of developers! The server is alot of fun, so join now! As of right now, we don't have much players but please stay. :)
[size=10pt]Webclient[/size]: www.aarscape.com/play
HISTORY: AARScape was one of the first Moparscape servers back when servers were first created on Kaitnieks forum. The server became so popular that the original creator of the edited client (Moparisthebest) joined the forums to talk to the players of AARScape and give information about his client. As time went on the server started to die due to the fact of the creator AARisAIR was getting board of java programming and moving on to playing Runescape. It is now back and running! It's constantly being updated!
[size=10pt]Forums[/size]: http://aarscape.com
[size=10pt]WHAT WE HAVE:[/size] Dedicated Staff Custom Teleports Custom Minigames Custom Skill [Disguise Skill] Quest [One quest right now working on more] All Stats go to Level 135 Clan Chat Works Pk Shop Bandos, Zamorak, Armadly, Saradomin Godswords Dragon Claws Many more things too! :)
PK SHOP [img]http://oi48.tinypic.com/nvz61d.jpg[/img]
Disguise Skill [Custom] [img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/20ixb2x.jpg[/img]
Custom Teleport Tab [img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/347gqkl.jpg[/img]
Dragon Claws [img]http://aar.im/i/claws-bg.png[/img]
VIDEO [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GiYHwzJg58Q[/youtube]

item.title: AARScape is BACK! [Old-School][Webclient]
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

I love how I was never informed that my server was going to be advertised lol. It is STILL in beta, and there is a lot of work to be done. All skills are being readded to work properly and the server is a lot different then the first one (mainly to gain detention to new players). Yes, this is the real aarscape. And thanks for all the support. Ill be updating in the time I can being that I have a full time job. Hope you guys enjoy.

Oh, and side note: Primal isn’t going to be added in. The only Items I think I will add is dragon claws and maybe the new tokhaar kal (simply because the model is looks great lol).

On another side note: Instead of barrows just being nearly the best weapons in the game, the full set gives you barrows effect (some the same, some different due to its uselessness in pvp)

Read full topic

item.title: AARScape is BACK! [Old-School][Webclient]
item.dc:creator: @Black_G1 Black G
item.description:
@Black_G1 wrote:

Soulcist:

Hmmm… I can see the domain is official but is this the REAL one? Anyway, it’s been a LONG time since I’ve seen this server and its name, however, with all due with respect, those forums, and “badges” are hideous.

It’s the REAL one. The previous forum was hacked, so Aaron made that one I guess he doesn’t have time to add new skins. Hat Trix is the main developer. X Don’t Sin X, Kadabra, Lollal, Sniffle6 are some of the the more notable members.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Black_G1 wrote:

AARscape has a friendly community forums where everyone is willing to help if needed. It also has a well rounded economy, and every skill works! We have custom mini games and custom quest with great rewards! The server is updated daily with a dedicated staff of developers! The server is alot of fun, so join now! As of right now, we don’t have much players but please stay.

[size=10pt]Webclient[/size]: www.aarscape.com/play

HISTORY:
AARScape was one of the first Moparscape servers back when servers were first created on Kaitnieks forum. The server became so popular that the original creator of the edited client (Moparisthebest) joined the forums to talk to the players of AARScape and give information about his client. As time went on the server started to die due to the fact of the creator AARisAIR was getting board of java programming and moving on to playing Runescape.
It is now back and running! It’s constantly being updated!

[size=10pt]Forums[/size]: http://aarscape.com

[size=10pt]WHAT WE HAVE:[/size]
